name: WearEverYouAre
overview:
WearEverYouAre.com is an international online shopping guide dedicated exclusively to woman fashion.

    Online boutiques are selected and listed upon criteria like originality and quality of the distributed products – with a precise goal in mind : go off the beaten track to make discover different fashion cultures.

    Online shoppers can take an e-shopping world tour in just a few minutes: they can visit multibrands boutiques, brand exclusive shop, marketplace, emerging designers e-shop, jewellery boutiques and even home decor, in 32 countries.

    WearEverYouAre’s asset is to give visiblity to online boutiques, independently of their notoriety. On WearEverYouAre.com, e-stores of emerging designers showcasing their limited collection are rubbing next to the big e-commerce lions that display thousands of brands. This diversity allows to make discover the tomorrow’s talents and to get access to a wide variety of products.


    Besides the e-boutique search engine,  WearEverYouAre has its own fashion blog.

A fashion news is published every day (7 days a week) with different themes: shopping ideas / styling tips/ focus on brands or online boutiques / interview of fashion bloggers & designers. Every recommended items are just a click away from purchase on e-boutiques.

    Also, by joining WearEverYouAre, users get the possiblity to create their personal address book to save their favorites e-boutiques and find them on each visit.
